title: Technical Program Manager III, Enterprise Reference Data, Corporate Engineering
location: São Paulo, State of São Paulo, Brazil
description: A problem isn’t truly solved until it’s solved for all. That’s why Googlers build products that help create opportunities for everyone, whether down the street or across the globe. As a Technical Program Manager at Google, you’ll use your technical expertise to lead complex, multi-disciplinary projects from start to finish...
key_qualifications: Bachelor's degree in a technical field, or equivalent practical experience. 5 years of experience in program management. Experience in enterprise data engineering or management (e.g., master data management, data warehousing, data analytics, business intelligence, visualization, data governance, data architecture, system integration).
preferred_qualifications: 5 years of experience managing cross-functional or cross-team projects. Experience in identifying, engaging, and influencing key stakeholders. Ability to establish and cultivate strategic partnerships. Excellent communication skills, with the ability to mediate and facilitate conversations.
responsibilities: Lead the implementation and ongoing management of the Enterprise Reference Data Management program. Collaborate with key stakeholders across the organization to ensure needs are met and that the program aligns with business objectives. Communicate program status, risks, and issues to executive management and stakeholders. Define strategic program ideas and roadmaps. Create and manage implementation plans including dependency mapping across multiple cross-functional teams.
